TenantSecurityNotificationRule.name: TenantSecurityNotificationRule
TenantSecurityNotificationRule.description: Stores an alert configured in the Security Center Alerts feature to notify recipients of changes made to security settings. For more information, see Create Alerts for Security Changes. This object is available to Security Center subscribers in API version 53.0 and later.

MetricsType.description: The type of data being collected.

Name.description: The name of the metric for which data is being collected.

NotificationRuleIdentifier.description: The ID of the alert that was triggered. This field is unique within your organization.

NotificationType.description: The type of notification used for the alert. The options are: Email In-App

Operator.description: The operator for the change that triggered the alert. For example, greater than.

RecipientEmails.description: The email addresses for the recipients of the alert details.

RuleName.description: The name of the custom alert that triggered the notification. This field is unique within your organization.

Status.description: The status of the alert setting. The options are: Active Draft Inactive

Threshold.description: The threshold value that triggered the alert.

TriggerType.description: The type of trigger used for the alert. The values are: Always On Change

Version.description: The version number of the custom alert.
